lead_paragraph: SCAGLIONE--Carolyn R. Denning, M.D. The Board of Directors of CF Care expresses its heartfelt sympathy to Dr. Peter Scaglione and Family. We lost our inspirational leader and ardent supporter, but her life's work will go on as we continue to secure her vision and model of CF care. Dr. Gwen Engelhard President John Z. Jacoby President Emeritus & The Board of CF Care 1/3
